snippet: State law leaves Tampa powerless to ban guns outside the G.O.P. convention in August. This is a dangerous folly that spotlights how timid American politicians are before the gun lobby.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Florida state law that leaves Tampa powerless to ban guns outside the Republican National Convention in August; condemns state's Republican-controlled Legislature for being on a leash held by the gun lobby; warns situation in Tampa is a dangerous folly that spotlights how timorous American politicians are about gun control.
lead_paragraph: State law leaves Tampa powerless to ban guns outside the G.O.P. convention in August. This is a dangerous folly that spotlights how timid American politicians are before the gun lobby.

headline.seo: The Law of the Gun in Florida
headline.main: The Law of the Gun in Florida
headline.print_headline: The Law of the Gun in Florida
